name: UpdateExtension
description:
Update an existing extension in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to update an existing extension in PagerDuty. Extensions are linked to services and require appropriate permissions. This call requires 'extensions.write' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the extension resource you want to update.

parameters.name: accept_versioning
parameters.description: The `Accept` header for versioning the request. This specifies the version of the API you are targeting.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the media type for the request. Use 'application/json' for JSON payloads.

parameters.name: extension_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the extension to be updated. This should include all fields necessary to describe the extension changes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
